pr_title: HBASE-24929 Introduce a special CellComparator for master local region

timeline.message: HBASE-24929 Introduce a special CellComparator for master local region
HBASE-24929 Introduce a special CellComparator for master local region

timeline.bodyText: Why need to expose this config? This should be a internal thing?
timeline.author: infraio

replies.bodyText: We need to set it in MasterRegion. And HRegion is IA.Private so no big problem?
replies.author: Apache9

timeline.author: infraio

replies.bodyText:
It is because now when moving a region at master side, we need locate meta first so we will go to master to ask the location for meta again. Now we only have 3 master rpc handlers so it is easy to dead lock if we have more than 3 parallel move requests...
Anyway, I've also changed this UT in #2392 and added comments to say this. Let me remove the modification in this PR.
replies.author: Apache9
